No, typically a bad idea. I'm about to give you a little lesson:

Mages are traditionally in mid lane because mid lane is the smallest lane in the game. Mages (again, traditionally) have weak escapes until the League Of Mobility champions came and ruined the game's meta. Mordekaiser is a melee mage.

The reason why you wouldn't want to do Mordekaiser top is because it's a big lane, Mordekaiser has no escapes or movement speed steroids. He's already slow as a boat. Unlike the 355 movement speed ass of a champ known as Pantheon. Whenever I'm jungling and there is a Mordekaiser top, I see it as a free kill waiting for me. Because Mordekaiser already pushes lanes hard with his Q, W and E. 

%%%%%%ed champions like Pantheon already beat the %%%% out of Mordekaiser early on in the game because of Mordekaiser's health costs.

Stick to Mordekaiser mid. This is also the reason I pioneered Darius mid. Scrublords beware.

I actually did it for my third promotion game into Silver (Bronze 1), I was so fed I even bought a Zhonyas for the legendary Golden(do) Dunk

The keys to Mord's success, 
1. You really like going ham.
2. Enemy really likes going ham.
3. There is no kiting, or the opponent doesn't know how.
4. All teamfights are relatively stationary.
5. Opponent constantly gives you free poke in lane, and duel you in minion wave. 

But worry not, anything is possible in low elo so give it a shot.
I only played him once (so far) and it was top I got extremely fed, forgot who I was versing tho.
Don't take this the wrong way, but at the rank you are in, anything is viable.
